meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>sky</kanji> <kanji>cave</kanji> is a cave with sky (open space) in it. This is a <vocabulary>hollow</vocabulary>, but can also refer to a <vocabulary>cavity</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
